strategy: Replace the gradient boosting ensemble with a neural network architecture (e.g., feedforward neural network) using deep learning, incorporating batch normalization and dropout layers to improve generalization. Apply advanced feature engineering such as polynomial features up to degree 2 on selected numerical variables (e.g., area, year_built) to capture non-linear interactions. Use target encoding with cross-validation-based smoothing and apply a logarithmic transformation to the target variable to stabilize variance. Train the model using early stopping on a validation set to prevent overfitting.

import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

X_val = X_val.fillna(X_val.median(numeric_only=True))
